Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2011 12:38PM herekitty024 wrote: AWH THAT IS SO BEAUTIFUL TAYLOR. I HAVE A DAUGHTER WHO IS 6 AND A SON WHO IS 10 AND THEY STILL HAVENT REALLY GRASPED THE CONCEPT OF CANCER. IF SO DID YOUR EJECTION FRACTION DROP TO 45%? MINES DID AND TODAY WHEN I WENT TO GET MY EVERY 3 WK DOSE OF HERCEPTIN I WAS TOLD I COULD NOT TAKE IT AND WAS REFERRED TO A CARDIOLOGIST. YOUR COMMENTS ARE APPRECIATED AS I WASNT GIVEN MUCH INFO.  KATHY

Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2011 04:25PM herekitty024 wrote: Hi Kathleen my first echo was april 2010 and March 8, 2011 was my second one. My initial ef was 60% and now a year later its 45%. I am visiting with the the Cardiologist next Tues April 6th and following up with my onc Thurs april 8th. I was told that once it drops below 50% they hold off further herceptin tx til it goes back up to 50% or higher.
